did.head: Descriptive Summary

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Edwin Gilbert, American Galley Proof, 1965, Accession #11010, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item was transferred from Rare Books, University of Virginia Library, to Special Collections on April 22, 1991.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of one galley proof (uncorrected, 448 pages) of the 1965 Edwin Gilbert novel American Chrome
